abstract: DealBook Online; Optimal Payments agrees to buy digital payment service Skrill Group for about $1.2 billion.
lead_paragraph: The deal, which values the target, the Skrill Group, at $1.2 billion, will increase the scale and geographic reach of Optimal’s business.

headline.main: Optimal Payments to Acquire Digital Payments Rival

snippet: The deal, which values the target, the Skrill Group, at $1.2 billion, will increase the scale and geographic reach of Optimal’s business.
